author: COMSOL
description: This introductory model treats the electrostatics problem of two concentric cylinders of infinite length, which is commonly found in textbooks. Since the problem can be solved analytically, the model can be used to compare theory with numerical simulation results. Two cases are considered: One with a fixed potential on each cylinder and the other with a surface charge density on one cylinder and a fixed potential on the other.
label: electric_field_concentric_cylinders.mph
name: root
